title: Rice Field in Winter
medium: oil and mixed media on canvas
provenance_text:
Yasuo Kazuki [1911-1974], Yamaguchi-ken, Japan; The Formes Gallery, Tokyo, Japan [1]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was included (no. 193, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by The Formes Gallery.
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International. It was accessioned on October 17, 1961.
